about_the_game:
As a subject of a virtual test you have been transferred into a world where you are a customer of a robbed bank. Left alone and locked you must gather all of your abilities to get out of that space which is full of secrets. You have no one to help you except your own wit. Can you solve all riddles and escape?



One of the genres for which VR is perfectly suitable is the Escape Room. Dive into this experience and enjoy the capabilities of your VR Headset in this indie game that should take you around 90 minutes to finish without counting the bonus content.

After finishing the game a new game mode is unlocked - Speedrun. Try your best and see how your results compare with your friends or the community worldwide.

Two bonus rooms "Office Trouble" and "Geek Heaven" are already available. They offer more challenging riddles and unique puzzles to test your problem-solving skills further.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 2600 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / RX 580 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR - Meta Headsets, Valve Index, Pico
  • Additional Notes: Works with: Quest, Quest 2, Quest 3, Quest Pro, Rift, Rift S, Valve Index, Pico Neo 3, Pico 4, PSVR2
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 2600 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 / RX 5700 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR - Meta Quest, Rift, Valve Index, Pico
  • Additional Notes: Works with: Quest, Quest 2, Quest 3, Quest Pro, Rift, Rift S, Valve Index, Pico Neo 3, Pico 4, PSVR2

short_description: You are in a bank after a robbery. Left alone and locked you must gather all of your abilities to get out of that space which is full of secrets. Can you solve all riddles and escape?
